attributes.action: Do not trigger article 50 of the Lisbon treaty.
attributes.additional_details:
The evidence is in not only affects on the global markets and our economy, but also the deep division in our country.
The sinister side is the vehicle created for racist groups and beliefs.
This cannot be permitted.
attributes.background:
Sanity must prevail after the EU referendum. Although democracy is paramount to our beliefs and has been fought for and won dearly, we cannot use it as a vehicle of madness.
Leaving the EU has already been proven to be utter folly and will seriously damage this country.
